Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Deathspeaker
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion Immune this turn.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: It helps to speak really, really loud.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Doomed Apprentice
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Your opponent's spells cost (1) more.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Jaina was never good at keeping up apprentices.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Drakkari Defender
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Taunt\nOverload: (3)
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Sometimes, the best defense is an offensive troll.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Drakkari Enchanter
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Your end of turn effects trigger twice.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Drakkari sorceresses have the irritating habit of repeating themselves at the end of every sentence. Every sentence.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Frozen Clone
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, add two copies of it to_your hand.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: It's like déjà vu, times two.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Ghoul
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Taunt

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Gnash
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Give your hero +3_Attack this turn. Gain 3 Armor.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: It's rude to gnash with your mouth open.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Happy Ghoul
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Costs (0) if your hero was healed this turn.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: When life gives you snow…

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Howlfiend
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Whenever this minion takes damage, discard a_random card.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: The problem is that he carries those cards in his mouth.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Howling Commander
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: Draw a Divine_Shield minion from your deck.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Enlistment in her battalion comes with several pairs of earplugs.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Hyldnir Frostrider
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: Freeze your other minions.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Don't be fooled, that polar bear's the one in charge.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Ice Breaker
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Destroy any Frozen minion damaged by_this.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: A great way to end a conversation.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Mindbreaker
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Hero Powers are disabled.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: He's a mind breaker, dream taker, ghoul trainer, don't you mess around with him.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Mountainfire Armor
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Deathrattle: If it's your opponent's turn,\ngain 6 Armor.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Excuse me. Your mountain is on fire.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Needy Hunter
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Whenever this minion attacks, add a Coin to your hand.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Plague Scientist
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Combo: Give a friendly minion Poisonous.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: The excruciating pain means it's working!

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Prince Taldaram
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: If your deck has_no 3-Cost cards, transform into a 3/3 copy of a minion.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Three Princes stand before you. This one wants to copy others.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Shadowblade
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: Your hero is Immune this turn.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: It's tacky to call it "Shadeblade."

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Shallow Gravedigger
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Deathrattle: Add a random Deathrattle minion to your_hand.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: It's hard to put them six feet under when you're three feet tall.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Simulacrum
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Copy the lowest Cost minion in your hand.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: It's like déjà vu, times two.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Stitched Tracker
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: Discover a copy of a minion in your deck.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: He's just exercising his right to bear arms.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Treachery
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Choose a friendly minion and give it to_your opponent.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Never look a gift minion in the mouth.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Unwilling Sacrifice
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Choose a friendly minion. Destroy it and a random enemy minion.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Stand right... there. Perfect, perfect! Now don't move.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Val'kyr Shadowguard
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: At the start of your turn, destroy a random enemy minion and this one.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Val'kyr Soulclaimer
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: [x]After this minion\nsurvives damage,\nsummon a 2/2 Ghoul.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: My Ghoul friend is back and you're gonna be in trouble.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Vryghoul
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: [x]Deathrattle: If it's your\nopponent's turn,\nsummon a 2/2 Ghoul.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: It's pronounced VERY GHOUL. Don't let anyone tell you different.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: A. F. Kay
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Can't attack.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Anti-Magic Shell
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Give your minions +2/+2 and "Can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers."

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Arfus
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Deathrattle: Add a random Death Knight card to your_hand.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: There must always be a Lick King.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Arrogant Crusader
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Deathrattle: If it's your opponent's turn, summon a 2/2 Ghoul.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: To be honest, he was kind of a jerk even BEFORE he was bitten by that ghoul.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Avalanche
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Freeze a minion and deal $3 damage to adjacent ones.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: One of our more snowbally cards.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Blood Razor
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry and Deathrattle:\nDeal 1 damage to all_minions.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: For the close shave that you've always wanted. Caution: Very sharp.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Bone Spike
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: At the start of your turn, deal 15 damage to the enemy hero.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Chillblade Champion
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Charge\nLifesteal
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: It slices, it dices, it vaporizes! The Chillblade will make a Champion out of even the lowliest gnome.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Corpsetaker
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: [x]Battlecry: Gain Taunt if your deck has a Taunt minion. Repeat for Divine Shield, Lifesteal, Windfury.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Her extensive collection of corpses includes one of nearly every type.  She'd love for you to join it.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Deathaxe Punisher
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: Give a random Lifesteal minion in your hand +2/+2.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Don't fear the Arcanite Reaper.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Eternal Servitude
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Discover a friendly minion that died this game. Summon it.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: What do you mean I don't get overtime pay for this?!

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Exploding Bloatbat
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Deathrattle:\nDeal 2 damage to all enemy minions.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: We've all been there after a night of one-too-many funnel cakes.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Festergut
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: At the end of your turn, deal 3 damage to all enemy minions.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Ghastly Conjurer
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: Add a 'Mirror Image' spell to your hand.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Wearing purple after the holidays? GHASTLY!

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Grave Shambler
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Whenever your weapon is destroyed, gain +1/+1.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: I think one of the necromancers got a little carried away.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Grim Necromancer
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: Summon two 1/1 Skeletons.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: WARNING: Skeletons will NOT explode.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Keening Banshee
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Whenever you play a card, remove the top 3 cards of_your deck.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: "What are your strengths?" the interviewer asked. "Well," she replied, "I'm really good at keening."

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Light's Sorrow
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: After a friendly minion loses Divine Shield, gain +1 Attack.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: These sorrows cut deep.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Lilian Voss
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: Replace spells in your hand with random spells (from your opponent's class).
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: She doesn't feel pity, or remorse, or fear. And she absolutely will not stop... ever, until all necromancers are dead.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Meat Wagon
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: [x]Deathrattle: Summon a minion from your deck with less Attack than this minion.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Necromancers call it "Meals on Wheels."

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Night Howler
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Whenever this minion takes\ndamage, gain +2 Attack.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Honestly, he howls during the day, too.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Phantom Freebooter
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: Gain stats equal to your weapon's.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: There's no such thing as a free boot.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Prince Valanar
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: If your deck has no 4-Cost cards, gain Lifesteal and Taunt.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Three Princes stand before you. This one devours one after another.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Professor Putricide
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: After you play a Secret,\nput a random Hunter Secret into the battlefield.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Among his more notable inventions: A tentacle-groomer, a plague that would wipe out all life on Azeroth, and a fidget spinner.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Rattling Rascal
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: [x]Battlecry: Summon a 5/5 Skeleton. Deathrattle: Summon one for your opponent.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Don't give up, skeleton!

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Runeforge Haunter
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: During your turn, your weapon doesn't lose Durability.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Don't worry, he'll keep an eye on that for you.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Saronite Chain Gang
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: [x]Taunt\nBattlecry: Summon a\ncopy of this minion.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Desperately needs some alone time.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Strongshell Scavenger
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: Give your Taunt minions +2/+2.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: It isn't "grave robbing" when there's no grave. It's just scavenging…

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Ticking Abomination
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Deathrattle: Deal 5 damage to your minions.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Abomination. Emphasis on the second syllable.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Water Elemental
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Freeze any character damaged by this minion.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Wicked Skeleton
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: Gain +1/+1 for_each minion that died_this turn.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: It's minions like these that give normal, law-abiding skeletons a bad rap.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Blood-Queen Lana'thel
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: [x]Lifesteal Has +1 Attack for each card you've discarded this game.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: As a young blood-princess she learned the proper way for a lady to curtsy, how to address fellow members of royalty, and how to bite them.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Bloodworm
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Lifesteal
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Queen Lana'thel insists on one of these, fried, every morning for breakfast.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Bolvar, Fireblood
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Divine Shield\nAfter a friendly minion loses_Divine Shield, gain +2 Attack.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: He's so hot right now.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Bone Baron
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Deathrattle: Add two 1/1 Skeletons to your hand.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: "Oil," "Rail," and "Blubber" were already taken.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Cobalt Scalebane
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: At the end of your turn, give another random friendly minion +3 Attack.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: You get a sword! And you get a sword! Everybody gets a sword!

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Corpse Raiser
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: [x]Battlecry: Give a friendly\nminion "Deathrattle:\n Resummon this minion."
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: He was just minding his business, farming corpses, when you meddling adventurers came along.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Corpse Widow
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Your Deathrattle cards cost_(2) less.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Her marriage survived death, but it decayed pretty quickly after that.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Death Revenant
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: Gain +1/+1 for each damaged minion.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: How's everyone doing? Hurt? Bleeding? Wounded? ... Excellent.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Despicable Dreadlord
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to all enemy minions.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: He's deathspicable.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Devour Mind
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Copy 3 cards in your opponent's deck and add them to your hand.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: A mind is a terrible thing to waste. Seconds, anyone?

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Doom Pact
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text:
[x]Destroy all minions. 
Remove the top card 
from your deck for each
minion destroyed.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Fatespinner
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Choose a Deathrattle (Secretly) - Deal 3 damage to all minions; or Give them +2/+2.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Her clothing? Pure silk, of course.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Fatespinner
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Secret Deathrattle: Deal 3 damage to all minions; or Give them +2/+2.@Secret Deathrattle: Give +2/+2 to all minions.@Secret Deathrattle: Deal 3 damage to all minions.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Fatespinner
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Deathrattle: Deal 3 damage to all minions and give them +2/+2.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Skelemancer
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Deathrattle: If it's your opponent's turn, summon an 8/8 Skeleton.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: What do you mean there's no such thing as "Skelemancy?" But "Dinomancy" is ok?

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Sunborne Val'kyr
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: Give adjacent minions +2 Health.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Bring valor to Odyn's halls, Champion!

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Thrall, Deathseer
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: Transform your minions into random ones that cost (2) more.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: "Do not be afraid. Approach. The dead will sleep… for now."

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Tomb Lurker
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: [x]Battlecry: Add a random\nDeathrattle minion that died\nthis game to your hand.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: She hangs out in all the tombs, but she rarely posts.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Valithria Dreamwalker
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Can't attack or be attacked while damaged.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Venomancer
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Poisonous
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Eight times the death of regular-mancers.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Voodoo Hexxer
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Taunt\nFreeze any character damaged by this minion.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: The Silver Hand recruits shuddered in terror when they saw the dreaded totem of the Hexxer: A tiny little snowman, impaled with pins.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Warlock on Fire
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to this minion.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Webweave
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Summon two 1/2 Poisonous Spiders.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: O, what a tangled web we weave, hoping spiders dodge the cleave.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Army of the Dead
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Remove the top 5 cards of your deck. Summon any minions removed.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Blackguard
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Whenever your hero is healed, deal that much damage to a random enemy minion.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: "Did I ever tell you the story of when I single-handedly took down a 29/29 C'thun?" - Reno Jackson

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Bone Drake
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Deathrattle: Add a random Dragon to your hand.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: The bone drake brings all the dragons to the yard. He would teach you, but you have no cards.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Bryn'troll, the Bone Arbiter
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Windfury

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Deathstalker Rexxar
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 2 damage\nto all enemy minions.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: "You were too slow, old friend. The hunt began long ago. And now... it will never end."

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Embrace Darkness
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: [x]Choose an enemy minion.\nAt the start of your turn,\ngain control of it.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Once you both get comfortable, darkness is actually pretty snuggly.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Furnacefire Colossus
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: Discard all weapons from your hand and gain their stats.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Smelts in his mouth, not in your hand.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Moorabi
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Whenever another minion is Frozen, add a copy of it to your hand.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Most disturbing is how Moorabi covers all those frozen minions with flavored syrup.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Necrotic Geist
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Whenever one of your other minions dies, summon a 2/2 Ghoul.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: An eye for an eye, and a ghoul for a ghoul.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Nerubian Unraveler
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Spells cost (2) more.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: He loves a good yarn.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Shadow Essence
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Summon a 5/5 copy of_a random minion in_your deck.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Difficult to bottle up and sell. But it packs a punch.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Skulking Geist
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: Destroy all\n1-Cost spells in both hands and decks.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: It's as though a million Jade Idols cried out, and were suddenly silenced.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Spectral Pillager
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: [x]Combo: Deal damage equal\nto the number of other cards\nyou've played this turn.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: It turns out you CAN take it with you.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Spellweaver
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Spell Damage +2
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Spells offer twice the moisture wicking of cotton.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Spreading Plague
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Summon a 1/5 Scarab with Taunt. If your_opponent has more minions, cast this again.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: In the past, plagues were spread by mice or fleas. These days they're spread by elves.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Tentacles
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Where'd those come from?

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Abominable Bowman
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: [x]Deathrattle: Summon\na random friendly Beast\nthat died this game.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Frosty the Bowman... was an angry hateful soul... with a fresh hewn bow and a missing nose...

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Archbishop Benedictus
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: Shuffle a copy of_your opponent's deck into your deck.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Nobody expects the Archbishop's Benediction!

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Bonemare
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion +4/+4 and Taunt.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Attacks her job with unbridled enthusiasm.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Frostmourne
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: Remove all your minions. Deathrattle: Resummon them.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Frostmourne
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Deathrattle: Summon every minion killed by this weapon.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Malfurion the Pestilent
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: [x]Choose One - Summon 2 Poisonous Spiders; or 2 Scarabs with Taunt.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: "Cenarius once taught me about the precarious balance between life and death. I have come to understand: there IS no balance. Death always wins."

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Scarab Plague
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Summon two 1/5 Scarabs with Taunt.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Scarab Shell
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: +3 Armor.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Spider Fangs
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: +3 Attack.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Spider Plague
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: [x]Summon two 1/2\nSpiders with Poisonous.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Glacial Mysteries
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Put one of each Secret from your deck into\nthe battlefield.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: The secret is in the frosting.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Grave Vengeance
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Lifesteal

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Rotface
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: [x]After this minion survives damage, summon a random Legendary minion.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Daddy! I think I made a Legendary!

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Scourgelord Garrosh
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: Equip a 4/3_Shadowmourne that also damages adjacent minions.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: "You dare to challenge me? Come! Draw your last breath - and then, you are mine."

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Shadowmourne
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Also damages the minions next to whomever your hero_attacks.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Shadowreaper Anduin
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: Destroy all minions with 5 or more_Attack.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: "I will tell you what Velen never taught me. Whosoever stands before the Light… inevitably casts a shadow."

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Sindragosa
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: Summon two 0/1 Frozen Champions.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: "I recognize your effort but I think your magic still has room for improvement." - Sindragosa after taking a class on giving constructive feedback.

Saviors of Uldum.text: [x]Hero Power Choose a minion with 2 or less Health. Destroy it and its neighbors.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Vulpera Scoundrel
Saviors of Uldum.text: Battlecry: Discover a spell or pick a mystery choice.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: A spell is a spell, but the mystery choice could be anything! (It's also a spell.)

Saviors of Uldum.name: Weaponized Wasp
Saviors of Uldum.text: Battlecry: If you control\na Lackey, deal 3_damage.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: Dr. Boom had one simple request: wasps with flippin' laser beams attached to their heads.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Wretched Reclaimer
Saviors of Uldum.text: [x]Battlecry: Destroy a friendly\nminion, then return it to life\nwith full Health.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: "Ok, here's the plan. We kill you, then bring you back." "Stronger?" "No, about the same."

Saviors of Uldum.name: Ancestral Guardian
Saviors of Uldum.text: Lifesteal\nReborn
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: No one knows whose ancestor he is, but he's still upset that you never call.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Bauble of Beetles
Saviors of Uldum.text: [x]Resurrect the first 4 friendly minions that died this game. Give them Reborn.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Bauble of Beetles
Saviors of Uldum.text: [x]Twinspell. Resurrect the first 4 friendly minions that died this game. Give them Reborn.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Blade of the Burning Sun
Saviors of Uldum.text: Battlecry: Give all minions in your deck +2 Attack.\nDeathrattle: Return this to your hand.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Bob's Bouncer
Saviors of Uldum.text:
[x]Choose a minion
and then cast 'Brawl.'
If that minion survives, fill
your board with copies of it.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Body Wrapper
Saviors of Uldum.text: Battlecry: Discover a friendly minion that died this game. Shuffle it into your deck.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: She uses pickle slices for the eyes. Keeps them well-preserved.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Bone Wraith
Saviors of Uldum.text: Taunt\nReborn
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: It uses only the eco-friendly bones from free-range humanoids.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Chain Lightning
Saviors of Uldum.text: [x]Hero Power Deal $1 damage to a minion. Jumps to an adjacent minion until one dies.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Conjured Mirage
Saviors of Uldum.text: Taunt\nAt the start of your turn, shuffle this minion into your deck.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: What you see is Isiset.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Diseased Vulture
Saviors of Uldum.text: Whenever your hero takes damage on your turn, summon a random\n3-Cost minion.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: He's off the twig! He's kicked the bucket! THIS IS AN EX-VULTURE!

Saviors of Uldum.name: Enflamed Golem
Saviors of Uldum.text: Deathrattle: Deal 3 damage to all minions and summon a Sanctum Golem.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Forbidden Power
Saviors of Uldum.text: [x]Hero Power Deal $@ damage to a random enemy (upgrades whenever a friendly minion dies).

Saviors of Uldum.name: Garden Gnome
Saviors of Uldum.text: [x]Battlecry: If you're holding\na spell that costs (5) or more,\nsummon two 2/2 Treants.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: "Greetings, my little shrubs... It's whittlin' time."

Saviors of Uldum.name: High Priest Amet
Saviors of Uldum.text: [x]Whenever you summon a\nminion, set its Health equal\nto this minion's.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: All minions are equal, but some minions are more equal than others.

Saviors of Uldum.name: House Special
Saviors of Uldum.text: Replace your Adventure Deck with one of Bob's Bombastic Decks.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Hyena Alpha
Saviors of Uldum.text: [x]Battlecry: If you control\na Secret, summon two\n2/2 Hyenas.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: Everything the sun touches is ours—so long as it's already dead.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Impbalming
Saviors of Uldum.text: Destroy a minion. Shuffle 3 Worthless Imps into your deck.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: With your complexion, Imp Balm is a great demonizer.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Jr. Excavator
Saviors of Uldum.text: Battlecry: Draw 3 cards.\nAny minions you draw\ncost_(2)_less.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: A good explorer's got to start somewhere - and this one is starting with digging. Lots of digging.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Jr. Tomb Diver
Saviors of Uldum.text: [x]Battlecry: If you played 6 Secrets this game, your Hero Power becomes 'Discover a Treasure'.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: This young explorer is looking to gain experience, even if it means facing off against horrific Plague Lords.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Noble Champion
Saviors of Uldum.text: [x]Hero Power Deal damage to a random enemy minion equal to its Attack.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Psychopomp
Saviors of Uldum.text: [x]Battlecry: Summon a random friendly minion that died this game. Give it Reborn.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: "Come with me if you want to re-live."

Saviors of Uldum.name: Restless Mummy
Saviors of Uldum.text: Rush\nReborn
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: Life-separation anxiety syndrome.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Royal Fervor
Saviors of Uldum.text: Windfury and Immune this turn.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Sahket Sapper
Saviors of Uldum.text: Deathrattle: Return a _random enemy minion to_ your_opponent's_hand.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: "Here, you dropped this."

Saviors of Uldum.name: Sanctum Golem
Saviors of Uldum.text: Can't Attack.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Scales of Justice
Saviors of Uldum.text: Transform all minions into 1/1 Murlocs.\nFill your hand with random Murlocs that cost (0).
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: An elegant weapon for a fishier age.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Shadow
Saviors of Uldum.text: Casts When Drawn\nSummon a {0}.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Shadow of Death
Saviors of Uldum.text: Choose a minion. Shuffle 3 'Shadows' into your deck that summon a copy when drawn.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: Making new friends takes skill.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Splitting Axe
Saviors of Uldum.text: Battlecry: Summon copies of your Totems.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: The ancient shaman chant, "Control Axe, Control Vee."

Saviors of Uldum.name: Sr. Excavator
Saviors of Uldum.text: Battlecry: Draw 3 cards.\nAny minions you draw\ncost_(5)_less.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: After excavating the tools to take down all four Plague Lords, this explorer earned his promotion.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Sr. Tomb Diver
Saviors of Uldum.text: [x]Battlecry: If you played 3 Secrets this game, your Hero Power becomes 'Discover a Treasure'.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: After facing off against each of the Plague Lords, this explorer has been promoted!

Saviors of Uldum.name: Staff of Ammunae
Saviors of Uldum.text: Twinspell.\nYour minions have Windfury and Immune this turn.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Staff of Ammunae
Saviors of Uldum.text: Your minions have Windfury and Immune this turn.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Sunstruck Henchman
Saviors of Uldum.text: At the start of your turn, this has a 50% chance to_fall asleep.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: There is E.V.I.L. here that DOES sleep.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Vessina
Saviors of Uldum.text: While you're Overloaded, your other minions have +2 Attack.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: She wasn't happy when Hagatha sent her back to Uldum. But her "angry" hiss sounds like her "happy" hiss, so no one knew the difference.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Advanced Targeting Monocle
Saviors of Uldum.text: Cast a copy of all spells in your deck (targets chosen randomly).

Saviors of Uldum.name: Ancient Reflections
Saviors of Uldum.text: Choose a minion.\nFill your board with 1/1 copies of it.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Anka, the Buried
Saviors of Uldum.text: Battlecry: Change each Deathrattle minion in your hand into a 1/1 that costs (1).
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: "You look familiar. Were you at my first funeral?"

Saviors of Uldum.name: Anubisath Defender
Saviors of Uldum.text: Taunt. Costs (0) if you've cast a spell that costs (5) or more this turn.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: Also comes running when he hears a can opener.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Bazaar Mugger
Saviors of Uldum.text: Rush\nBattlecry: Add a random minion from another class to your hand.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: Premium muggings at a discount price.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Cloud Prince
Saviors of Uldum.text: Battlecry: If you control a Secret, deal 6 damage.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: "In West Cloudidelphia, born and raised; flinging lightning for the rest of my days."

Saviors of Uldum.name: Dark Pharaoh Tekahn
Saviors of Uldum.text: Battlecry: For the rest of the game, your Lackeys are 4/4.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: He'll get that League of Explorers and their little murloc too!

Saviors of Uldum.name: Desert Obelisk
Saviors of Uldum.text:
[x]If you control 3 of these
at the end of your turn,
deal 5 damage to a
random enemy.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: The Obelisk of the Stars can hide an entire land from prying eyes! Or zap a rando.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Duchess
Saviors of Uldum.text: Rush

Saviors of Uldum.name: Duke
Saviors of Uldum.text: Rush

Saviors of Uldum.name: Elise the Enlightened
Saviors of Uldum.text: Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, duplicate your hand.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: From cartographer to combatant, Elise has taken the road less traveled—because no one else could find it on a map.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Faceless Lurker
Saviors of Uldum.text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Double this minion's Health.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: Longtime lurker, first time attacker.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Karl the Lost
Saviors of Uldum.text: [x]Battlecry: Summon six 1/1 Silver_Hand_Recruits and give all friendly minions Taunt and Divine Shield.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: A friendly paladin who was found wandering Uldum. He seems to be looking for someone.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Mortuary Machine
Saviors of Uldum.text: After your opponent plays a minion, give it Reborn.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: The ankle bone's connected to the shin bone. The knuckle bone's connected to the... eh, it'll be fine.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Naga Sand Witch
Saviors of Uldum.text: [x]Battlecry: Change the Cost\nof spells in your hand to (5).
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: 5 mana footlong, anyone?

Saviors of Uldum.name: Oasis Surger
Saviors of Uldum.text: Rush\nChoose One - Gain +2/+2; or Summon a copy of this minion.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: Surge's up, dude!

Saviors of Uldum.name: Phalanx Commander
Saviors of Uldum.text: Your Taunt minions\nhave +2 Attack.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: Turns out he's really good at herding cats.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Phaoris' Blade
Saviors of Uldum.text: Windfury.\nAfter your hero attacks and kills a minion, this gains +2/+1.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Plague of Wrath
Saviors of Uldum.text: Destroy all damaged minions.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: "Thanks, I HATE it!"

Saviors of Uldum.name: Runaway Gyrocopter
Saviors of Uldum.text: Rush. Deathrattle: Deal 5 damage to all enemy minions, then shuffle\nthis into your deck.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Sandhoof Waterbearer
Saviors of Uldum.text: At the end of your turn, restore #5 Health to a damaged friendly character.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: Used to carrying for his team.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Staff of Scales
Saviors of Uldum.text: Summon three 1/1 Snakes with Rush, Poisonous and Reborn.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Stone Fox Statue
Saviors of Uldum.text: Choose a minion and add 2 copies of it to your hand that cost (0).

Saviors of Uldum.name: The Gatling Wand
Saviors of Uldum.text: [x]Deal $@ damage split randomly among all enemies (improves for each spell you've cast this game).
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: The mightiest, mysticalest, fully automatic spellcasting tool the world has ever seen.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Wasteland Assassin
Saviors of Uldum.text: Stealth\nReborn
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: They'll never see me coming, what with my glowing body, eyes and daggers.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Armagedillo
Saviors of Uldum.text: [x]Taunt At the end of your turn, give all Taunt minions in your hand +2/+2.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: We may never know what provoked it, but we will never forget the consequences.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Armored Goon
Saviors of Uldum.text: Whenever your hero attacks, gain 5 Armor.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: Armored except for non-critical areas, such as the head, torso, fists and thighs.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Blatant Decoy
Saviors of Uldum.text: [x]Deathrattle: Each player\nsummons the lowest Cost\nminion from their hand.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: "Hah! You is being tricked by ME! Togwaggle!"

Saviors of Uldum.name: Brann's Epic Egg
Saviors of Uldum.text: After this takes damage, summon King Krush.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: If it takes a village to raise a child, then it takes a herd to raise this egg.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Hidden Oasis
Saviors of Uldum.text: Choose One - Summon a 6/6 Ancient with Taunt; or Restore #12 Health.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: Amazing that it's been hidden, given the twenty-foot treant splashing around in it.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Khartut Defender
Saviors of Uldum.text: [x]Taunt, Reborn\nDeathrattle: Restore #3\nHealth to your hero.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: Gesundheit!

Saviors of Uldum.name: Pharaoh's Blessing
Saviors of Uldum.text: Give a minion +4/+4, Divine Shield, and Taunt.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: Life hack: Sneeze near a pharaoh.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Reno the Relicologist
Saviors of Uldum.text: Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, deal 10 damage randomly split among all enemy minions.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: All his life, Reno Jackson was only a gatling wand away from becoming the greatest and most terrifying mage who ever existed.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Riftcleaver
Saviors of Uldum.text: Battlecry: Destroy a minion. Your hero takes damage equal to its Health.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: Brings you face to face with your destructive impulses.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Scarlet Webweaver
Saviors of Uldum.text: Battlecry: Reduce the Cost of a random Beast in your_hand by (5).
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: Isn't that nice? The spider made the explorer a sleeping bag!

Saviors of Uldum.name: Swarm of Locusts
Saviors of Uldum.text: Summon seven 1/1 Locusts with Rush.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: Good things never come in swarms.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Vir'naal Ancient
Saviors of Uldum.text: Taunt

Saviors of Uldum.text: Battlecry: Summon a minion from your opponent's hand. Attack it.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: Tame Bloodstingers would politely invite your minion to tea.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Dinotamer Brann
Saviors of Uldum.text: Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, summon King Krush.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: Brann's new dino-taming hobby is going well—his pet can already make him sit, stand, and roll over!

Saviors of Uldum.name: Earthquake
Saviors of Uldum.text: Deal $5 damage to all minions, then deal $2 damage to all minions.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: Shake it, sh-sh-sh-shake it like a Kalimdor fissure.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Flex-plosion
Saviors of Uldum.text: Blow up half your opponent's stuff.

Saviors of Uldum.text: Restore #5 Health\nto all characters.\nDraw 5 cards.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: It's a high five followed by a low tide.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Siamat
Saviors of Uldum.text: [x]Battlecry: Gain 2 of Rush,\nTaunt, Divine Shield, or\nWindfury (your choice).
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: TAUNT. TAUNT.

Saviors of Uldum.text: Resurrect 7 friendly minions with\nthe highest Cost.\nGive them Taunt.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: In the right hands, the awesome power of resurrection can be used for the greater good.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Wasteland Scorpid
Saviors of Uldum.text: Poisonous
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: After they get to a certain size, it doesn't matter if they're poisonous or not.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Wrapped Golem
Saviors of Uldum.text: [x]Reborn At the end of your turn, summon a 1/1 Scarab with Taunt.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: The end result of one of the greatest wrap battles of all time.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Octosari
Saviors of Uldum.text: Deathrattle: Draw 8 cards.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: Eight arms of sand-flinging, foe-wringing, card-slinging fury!

Saviors of Uldum.text: Battlecry: Deal 5 damage.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: PIT! Not PET!

Saviors of Uldum.text: Summon 7 Murlocs from your deck.

Saviors of Uldum.text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Summon a copy of this minion.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: Also known as an ancient copy machine.

Saviors of Uldum.text: [x]Battlecry: Discover a spell\nin your deck and cast it\nwith random targets.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: A tortollan made it to the desert!

Saviors of Uldum.text: Deathrattle: Give all minions in your hand +3/+3.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: Some dogs will bring you a bone or a squeaky toy. This one brings war!

Saviors of Uldum.name: King Krush
Saviors of Uldum.text: Charge

Saviors of Uldum.text: [x]Rush. Costs (1) less for each\nminion on the battlefield.

Saviors of Uldum.text: Silence and destroy all_minions.

Saviors of Uldum.flavor: This is not the greatest card in the world. This is just a monument.

Descent of Dragons.text: Battlecry: Invoke Galakrond.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: Raising Galakrond will cause thurible, thurible damage.

Descent of Dragons.name: Draconic Lackey
Descent of Dragons.text: Battlecry: Discover a Dragon.

Descent of Dragons.flavor: Scissors, knives, needles, you name it! He'll shoot it.

Descent of Dragons.text: [x]Sidequest: Spend 8 Mana on spells. Reward: Summon a 6/6 Dragon.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: Upon taking up the spellbook, Reno realized with a start: "I can't read."

Descent of Dragons.name: Leper Gnome
Descent of Dragons.text: Deathrattle: Deal 2 damage to the enemy_hero.

Descent of Dragons.text: Add 3 random Mage spells to your hand.

Descent of Dragons.name: Praise Galakrond!
Descent of Dragons.text: [x]Give a minion +1 Attack.\nInvoke Galakrond.

"Turn to Galakrond, Chapter 3 Verse 12.

'SNARL! ROAR! GRAAAAGH!'

Let us reflect on this wisdom."

Descent of Dragons.name: Rain of Fire
Descent of Dragons.text: Deal $1 damage to all_characters.

Descent of Dragons.text: [x]Give a minion +1/+2.\nGive it Divine Shield if\nyou're holding a Dragon.

Descent of Dragons.text: Sidequest: Attack twice with your hero. Reward: Add 3 'Claw' spells to your hand.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: "Tied it down, boss. I don't really know why you asked me to do that."

Descent of Dragons.name: Sky Raider
Descent of Dragons.text: Battlecry: Add a random Pirate to your hand.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: Maybe he should've hatched a plan that could actually carry booty back too.

Descent of Dragons.name: Small Repairs

Descent of Dragons.name: Spin 'em Up

Descent of Dragons.name: Treenforcements

Descent of Dragons.name: Brewing Storm

[x]Deal $3 damage to a
minion. If you're holding
a Dragon, it also hits
the enemy hero.

Descent of Dragons.text: Poisonous\nCan't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.

Descent of Dragons.text: [x]Hero Power\nSummon two 1/1 Imps.

whether the Nether is hot,
we'll burn together,
whatever the Nether,
whether we like it or not."

Descent of Dragons.text: Battlecry: Summon a 2/2_Treant.

Descent of Dragons.name: Spirit Wolf

Descent of Dragons.name: Windswept Elemental

Descent of Dragons.text: Invoke Galakrond.\nGive your minions +1_Attack.

Descent of Dragons.name: Fire Hawk

Descent of Dragons.name: Goboglide Tech

Descent of Dragons.name: Lightning Breath
Descent of Dragons.text:
[x]Deal $4 damage to a
minion. If you're holding
a Dragon, also damage
its neighbors.

Descent of Dragons.text: Battlecry: Reduce the Cost of Dragons in your deck by_(2).

Descent of Dragons.name: Grave Rune
Descent of Dragons.text: Give a minion "Deathrattle: Summon 2 copies of this."
Descent of Dragons.flavor: I'm gravely sorry to rune this.

Descent of Dragons.name: Gryphon
Descent of Dragons.text: Rush

Descent of Dragons.name: Indomitable Champion
Descent of Dragons.text: Taunt

Descent of Dragons.text: Rush

Descent of Dragons.name: Veiled Worshipper
Descent of Dragons.text: [x]Battlecry: If you've Invoked\ntwice, draw 3 cards.

Descent of Dragons.name: Wing Commander

Descent of Dragons.text: Draw 2 cards.\nCosts (2) less for each Treant you control.

Descent of Dragons.name: Amber Watcher

Descent of Dragons.name: Chromatic Egg

Descent of Dragons.name: Chronobreaker
Descent of Dragons.text: [x]Deathrattle: If you're holding\na Dragon, deal 3 damage\nto all enemy minions.

Descent of Dragons.name: Cobalt Spellkin
Descent of Dragons.text: Battlecry: Add two 1-Cost spells from your class to_your hand.

Descent of Dragons.name: Corrupt Elementalist
Descent of Dragons.text: Battlecry: Invoke Galakrond twice.

Descent of Dragons.name: Crazed Netherwing
Descent of Dragons.text: Battlecry: If you're holding\na Dragon, deal 3 damage to all other characters.

Descent of Dragons.name: Cumulo-Maximus

Descent of Dragons.name: Dragon's Pack

Descent of Dragons.name: Faceless Corruptor
Descent of Dragons.text: [x]Rush. Battlecry: Transform\none of your minions into\na copy of this.

Descent of Dragons.name: Kobold Stickyfinger

Descent of Dragons.name: Malygos, Aspect of Magic
Descent of Dragons.text: [x]Battlecry: If you're holding\na Dragon, Discover an\n upgraded Mage spell.

Descent of Dragons.name: Shield of Galakrond

Descent of Dragons.name: Skyfin

Descent of Dragons.name: Stowaway
Descent of Dragons.text: [x]Battlecry: If there are cards\nin your deck that didn't start\nthere, draw 2 of them.

Descent of Dragons.name: Tentacled Menace

Descent of Dragons.name: Time Rip

Descent of Dragons.name: Waxadred
Descent of Dragons.text: [x]Deathrattle: Shuffle a Candle into your deck that resummons Waxadred when drawn.

Descent of Dragons.name: Waxadred's Candle
Descent of Dragons.text: Casts When Drawn\nSummon Waxadred.

Descent of Dragons.name: Abyssal Summoner

Descent of Dragons.name: Camouflaged Dirigible

Descent of Dragons.name: Candle Breath
Descent of Dragons.text: Draw 3 cards. Costs (3)_less while you're holding a Dragon.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: "And Waxadred shall light their fires, with roaring breath hotter than pyres!\n \nCome before him, scamp and vandal, pledge your faith and lift your candle!"

Descent of Dragons.name: Dragoncaster
Descent of Dragons.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, your next spell this turn costs (0).
Descent of Dragons.flavor: It’s challenging to perform magic on dragonback. It’s so easy to drop the rabbit.

Descent of Dragons.name: Emerald Explorer
Descent of Dragons.text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Discover a Dragon.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: Make it a double dragon!

Descent of Dragons.name: Evasive Wyrm

Descent of Dragons.name: Flik Skyshiv

Descent of Dragons.name: Gyrocopter
Descent of Dragons.text: Rush\nWindfury

Descent of Dragons.name: Kronx Dragonhoof
